titles.title: Blue Energy Innovation Act of 2022
Blue Energy Innovation Act of 2022
To establish the Integrated Blue Economy and Blue Energy Technologies Program, and a Blue Economy Center of Excellence, to support research and development of blue energy technologies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Blue Energy Innovation Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Energy to establish and implement the Integrated Blue Economy and Blue Energy Technologies Program to provide funding for research and development of blue energy technologies for specified purposes (e.g., developing new blue energy market opportunities). Blue energy technologies are technologies that (1) derive or generate energy from a renewable energy resource or capture, remove, and sequester greenhouse gases; and (2) are located in an aquatic environment.
